DOC.brief_summary: We investigate chronic effect daily assumption Viagra blood vessel function patient impotence . The study include 2 group : 1- patient multiple risk factor , e.g . hypertension 2- patient cardiovascular risk factor
DOC.detailed_description: We investigate chronic effect daily assumption Viagra blood vessel function patient impotence . The study include 2 group : 1- patient multiple risk factor , e.g . hypertension 2- patient cardiovascular risk factor
